title: Ferne McCann snogged Love Island’s Jordan Hames because ‘you only live once’
text:
Ferne said it was just a snog so everyone calm down (Picture: Rex)

Ferne McCann has cleared up those rumours surrounding her kiss with Love Island star Jordan Hames, insisting that they had a ‘little snog’ and nothing else is happening.

Ferne – who was previously on The Only Way Is Essex – had invited the 24-year-old to her cocktail launch party in September and they reportedly couldn’t take their hands off each other.

But now Ferne has joked that although the pair ‘had a little kiss’ it doesn’t mean they’re loved up, engaged and preparing to move in together.

‘Everyone’s like “they’ve been dating they’ve confirmed their relationship”, I met him that night and we had a little snog, yolo!’ she told new magazine.

‘What’s a snog between reality stars?’

Indeed.

‘What’s a snog between reality stars?’ (Picture: Rex)

Jordan rose to fame when he coupled up with Anna Vakili, 29, on this year’s ITV2 dating show but the pair had this season’s most dramatic split when he suddenly decided to pursue India Reynolds out of the blue.

It didn’t help that he found himself beefing Anna after commenting ‘facts’ on a social media post about her sister Mandi being ‘fame hungry’.

Jordan was dumped from Love Island after a shocking 24 hours (Picture: ITV2)

Ferne, 29, posted an image of her kissing her new man as they packed on the PDA but it has since been deleted, and she added to the magazine: ‘Why is it always me who gets snapped doing it?’

description: Ferne McCann and Jordan Hames were pictured kissing in London but it was just a kiss between reality stars.
